description:
Ryo comes across a college girl who is a fan of detective movies, and she tails Ryo for a chance to see some action, not knowing Ryo`s lecherous tendencies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ryou tte Nanimono? Joshidaisei mo Thrill ni Meromero
Who Is Heck Is Ryo? Even the College Girl Is Smitten with the Thrill
りょうって何者? 女子大生もスリルにメロメロ
